{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Netehe |image = Portrait Netehe Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Tumara and Netehe.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Chanter |level = 1 |MIG = 12 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 40 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 20 / 20 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 20 |fortitude = 24 |reflex = 22 |will = 25 |dr = 3 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/), [At the Sight of their Comrades, their Hearts Grew Bold](/atTheSightOfTheirComradesTheirHeartsGrewBoldDeadfire/), [But Reny Daret's Ghost, He Would not Rest](/butRenyDaretsGhostHeWouldNotRestDeadfire/) |location = [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/)
[Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/) |quests = [The Archmage's Vault](/theArchmagesVault/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Mataru Clothing |internalname = NPC_Netehe |guid = 8c08df69-5cea-44e7-bbe9-4c2a7390f9da }} '''Netehe''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background A calm and composed Huana woman, arguing with a Rauataian sailor before Arkemyr's manor. She is an emissary from the Queen, sent to remind both [Tumara](/tumara/) and [Arkemyr](/arkemyr/) that the tablet belongs to the Huana - not archmages or Rauatai. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [The Archmage's Vault](/theArchmagesVault/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [The Archmage's Vault](/theArchmagesVault/): You can choose to return the tablet to her for the [Huana](/huana/). [Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/) [Category:Serpent's Crown characters](/categorySerpentsCrownCharacters/)

[[Serpent's Crown]] |quests = [[The Archmage's Vault]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Mataru Clothing |internalname = NPC_Netehe |guid = 8c08df69-5cea-44e7-bbe9-4c2a7390f9da }} '''Netehe''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== A calm and composed Huana woman, arguing with a Rauataian sailor before Arkemyr's manor. She is an emissary from the Queen, sent to remind both [[Tumara]] and [[Arkemyr]] that the tablet belongs to the Huana - not archmages or Rauatai. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [[The Archmage's Vault]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[The Archmage's Vault]]: You can choose to return the tablet to her for the [[Huana]].
